metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17712 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high
metadata.Description:
The raw_sendmsg() function in net/ipv4/raw.c in the Linux kernel through4.14.6 has a race condition in inet->hdrincl that leads to uninitializedstack pointer usage; this allows a local user to execute code and gainprivileges.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17712` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-116.140
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-116.140
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-116.140
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

No subscription required
